title: GEOLOGIC MAP OF THE DRY VALLEY RIM WILDERNESS STUDY AREA, LASSEN COUNTY, CALIFORNIA, AND WASHOE COUNTY, NEVADA
base_map: U.S. Geological Survey Shinn Mtn. 1954, Wendel 1954, California 1:62,500, Smoke Creek Ranch 1980, Salt Marsh 1980, Red Rock Canyon 1980, Sheeps head Spring 1981, Parker Canyon 1980, and Sand Pass 1980, Nevada, 1:24,000
